headers.subject: [tosdr:371] The good, bad and neutral - Instagram.com
headers.x-original-authentication-results: ls.google.com; spf=pass (google.com: domain of andreramseier@gmail.com designates internal as permitted sender) smtp.mail=andreramseier@gmail.com; dkim=pass header.i=@gmail.com

html:
Basic Terms

1. You must be 13 years or older to use this site. 

General Conditions

  1. We reserve the right to modify or terminate the Instagram service for any reason, without notice at any time
2. We reserve the right to alter these Terms of Use at any time. If the alterations constitute a material change to the Terms of Use, we will notify you via internet mail according to the preference expressed on your account. What constitutes a "material change" will be determined at our sole discretion, in good faith and using common sense and reasonable judgement.

3. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.

Proprietary Rights in Content on Instagram

  1. Instagram does NOT claim ANY ownership rights in the text, files, images, photos, video, sounds, musical works, works of authorship, applications, or any other materials (collectively, "Content") that you post on or through the Instagram Services. By displaying or publishing ("posting") any Content on or through the Instagram Services, you hereby grant to Instagram a non-exclusive, fully paid and royalty-free, worldwide, limited license to use, modify, delete from, add to, publicly perform, publicly display, reproduce and translate such Content, including without limitation distributing part or all of the Site in any media formats through any media channels, except Content not shared publicly ("private") will not be distributed outside the Instagram Services.

http://instagram.com/about/legal/terms/

[Bad]
1. Instagram can change or delete it's website at any time without notice

2. Instagram can change the ToS at any time, they may inform you of the change but only if they themselves deem it a material change.

3. Instagram can refuse service to anyone for any reason

4. By posting content, you grant instagram full access to all materials(paid and royalty free) to use however they want
(unless a user selects private on content posted)

[Good]

1. Instagram does not claim ownership of any materials posted

[Neutral] 

1. You must be 13 years or older to use instagram

--
www.tos-dr.info // www.twitter.com/tosdr // www.github.com/Unhosted/ToS-DR
---

subject: The good, bad and neutral - Instagram.com
text:
Basic Terms
1. You must be 13 years or older to use this site. 
General Conditions
   
   1. We reserve the right to modify or terminate the Instagram service for 
   any reason, without notice at any time

2. We reserve the right to alter these Terms of Use at any time. If the 
alterations constitute a material change to the Terms of Use, we will 
notify you via internet mail according to the preference expressed on your 
account. What constitutes a "material change" will be determined at our 
sole discretion, in good faith and using common sense and reasonable 
judgement.

3. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any 
time.

Proprietary Rights in Content on Instagram
   
   1. Instagram does NOT claim ANY ownership rights in the text, files, 
   images, photos, video, sounds, musical works, works of authorship, 
   applications, or any other materials (collectively, "Content") that you 
   post on or through the Instagram Services. By displaying or publishing 
   ("posting") any Content on or through the Instagram Services, you hereby 
   grant to Instagram a non-exclusive, fully paid and royalty-free, worldwide, 
   limited license to use, modify, delete from, add to, publicly perform, 
   publicly display, reproduce and translate such Content, including without 
   limitation distributing part or all of the Site in any media formats 
   through any media channels, except Content not shared publicly ("private") 
   will not be distributed outside the Instagram Services.


http://instagram.com/about/legal/terms/

[Bad]
1. Instagram can change or delete it's website at any time without notice

2. Instagram can change the ToS at any time, they may inform you of the 
change but only if they themselves deem it a material change.

3. Instagram can refuse service to anyone for any reason

4. By posting content, you grant instagram full access to all 
materials(paid and royalty free) to use however they want
(unless a user selects private on content posted)

[Good]

1. Instagram does not claim ownership of any materials posted

[Neutral] 

1. You must be 13 years or older to use instagram

--
